name: test_e2e_with_logs[001_SQLI_2ND_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_2ND_001` |
| **Name** | Second-order UNION injection via stored value |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | second_order |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `admin' UNION SELECT version(),NULL,NULL-- `
- **Encoded**: `admin'%20UNION%20SELECT%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL--%20`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~66000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:54:06.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_2ND_001-1770818046431-de09h pattern_id=SQLI_2ND_001 uri=/?q=admin'%20UNION%20SELECT%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL--%20 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_2ND_001-1770818046431-de09h pattern_id=SQLI_2ND_001 uri=/?q=admin'%20UNION%20SELECT%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL--%20 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
